title: PAIRING ELIGIBILITY

replies.body: "IT IS ALWAYS MATING SEASON FOR FLESHLINGS" Hahahaa, nice entry. Good stuff.

Thanks so much for the reply. It really makes me happy to know that people have read and enjoyed my work... and especially to know it may have brightened your day. I saw you have been reading most posts on a different comment and I'd like to thank you for taking the time for this and also to everyone else doing the same.
I CAN'T STOP LAUGHING HELP ME

You're welcome. Thank-you
Alse, I forgot to mention in my earlier post but I would like to offer my salutations to all other contestants and say that you have all done a great job simply by rising to the challenge to create a fan fiction. Congratulations and good luck!!!
